title: Punk Beats School Bus Driver

content: quote: The teen, whose name has not been released, is charged as a juvenile with assault with intent to do great bodily harm less than murder, Kalamazoo County Assistant Prosecutor Karen Hayter said Wednesday. The boy, who was being lodged at the Kalamazoo County Juvenile Home, is scheduled to appear April 3 in the Kalamazoo County Circuit Court Family Division for a pretrial hearing. Meanwhile, the bus driver, a 37-year-old Kalamazoo woman whose name also has not been released, was treated at Bronson Methodist Hospital for a broken finger and bruising, cuts and scrapes to her face and head, Kalamazoo Township Police Chief Tim Bourgeois said. The woman was released from the hospital Tuesday night, the chief said. <more> "http://www.mlive.com/news/kalamazoo/index.ssf/2009/03/boy_charged_in_assault_on_scho.html

content: I saw it a couple of days ago and it was brutal. Anger the shiite out of me. These were not love taps. Having been pulled away at least twice he broke free to continue the onslaught of the lady strapped in the drivers seat with no protection. The kid that pulled him off was two foot taller but couldn't control him. This is a case the family needs to come to grips either medically or institutionally. His approach was that this was not the first time, looked to had experience, his contact hits like Mike Tyson.
